A modular tiny house that can be easily assembled and disassembled for transportation and storage.
A tiny house built on a trailer, allowing for easy mobility and transportability.
A tiny house with a rooftop garden or greenhouse, providing fresh produce year-round.
A tiny house designed to be energy-efficient and self-sufficient, using solar panels, rainwater harvesting, and composting toilets.
A tiny house built using repurposed materials, such as reclaimed wood or recycled metal.
